title: The UK Creeps
description:
This week's episode takes place in the United Kingdom. First, Sapphire shares a true story about a girl’s imaginary friend named Tom. Then, she explains why you should never say a demon’s name out loud. After that, she attempts to solve mysterious activity at a summer camp, and escape the cry of a banshee.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
